Burger 34 Popular This Week All Menu Items Qty 30/- Quantity Add to Cart
Aloo Tikki Burger Aloo tikki is a snack originating from the Indian subcontinent; in North Indian and Bangladeshi preparation, it is made out of boiled potatoes, peas, and various curry spices. Aloo means potato, and the word tikki means a small cutlet or croquette in Hindi and Marathi. 20/- BUY\n20 rs Only
Mayonnaise Burger Burgers taste better with mayo. Yeah, delicious, creamy mayonnaise, scooped straight from the jar, judiciously smeared across a lightly toasted bun and smooshed into a juicy pattyâ€”hold the ketchup, hold the mustard. You\'ve gotta try it. 25/- BUY\n25 rs Only
Schezwan Burger Schezwan Burgers are a spicy amalgamation of the Schezwan ingredients you might find in recipes like Crispy Schezwan, Kung Pao Stir Frys, and Dan Dan Noodles. Ginger, garlic, peanuts, sesame, Chinese vinegar, soy, and a whole lot of spice make these burgers completely irresistible. 30/- BUY\n30 rs Only
Paneer Burger Think spicy and our Indian masalas are sure to spring up in your mind! Yes, this cutlet features a blend of common Indian spices, ensuring a top rating by our desi taste buds. 40/- BUY\n40 rs Only
Cheese Burger A cheeseburger is a hamburger topped with cheese. Traditionally, the slice of cheese is placed on top of the veg patty, but the burger can include variations in structure, ingredients and composition. The cheese is usually added to the cooking hamburger patty shortly before serving, which allows the cheese to melt. 45/- BUY\n45 rs Only
